title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Survey-Based Research Design for Comparing Online Educational Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using online education tools and basic understanding of educational methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Explain the characteristics and differences between types of online educational environments (general vs. emergency remote).
Design a research method to analyze learner experiences using survey tools.
Apply statistical analyses (frequency analysis, t-tests) to evaluate differences in educational environments.
Propose effective online education design strategies based on research findings.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
